SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.task

Class TaskRegistry

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.task.TaskRegistry
public class TaskRegistry extends Object
A registry of a task. Holds contextual data required to process tasks, as well as a reference to the task itself.
See Also:
  • Task

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected long
    lastExecutionTime
    The time at which this task was most recently executed at.

    A reference to the task this registry holds.

    • getTask

    • getLastExecutionTime

      public long getLastExecutionTime()
      Returns the last execution time of this task.
      Returns:
      The last execution time of this task

    • execute

      public void execute() throws RuntimeException
      Execute this task if possible. (the delta is greater than or equal to the task's interval)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - When an exception occurs during the task's execution

    • forceExecute

      public void forceExecute() throws RuntimeException
      Forcefully executes this task, without respecting its interval.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - When an exception occurs during the task's execution
